trans-unit.source: Represents a control that when clicked displays an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> from which the user can select a single item.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> looks like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, but it shows a drop-down area when the user clicks it.
Hide or show the drop-down arrow by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> property.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton> that displays items that overflow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> to activate familiar drop-down controls such as color pickers.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> property to `true` to more clearly indicate to the user that further options are available on the drop-down list.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class that displays the specified image.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class that displays the specified text and image and raises the `Click` event.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
The event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> containing the items of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> class that has the specified name, displays the specified text and image, and raises the `Click` event.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.
The event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the `Text` property or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText"></xref> property for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> ToolTip.
`true` to use the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text"></xref> property for the ToolTip; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
Gets a value indicating whether to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> that is defined as the default.
`true` in all cases.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseLeave"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Retrieves a value indicating whether the drop-down list of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref> has items.
The character to process.
`true` if the drop-down list has items; otherwise, `false`.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether an arrow is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>, which indicates that further options are available in a drop-down list.
`true` to show an arrow on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
